Detailed Description

An abstraction of an OpenGL framebuffer.

Member Function Documentation

◆ blit() [1/2]

void rev::FrameBuffer::blit ( BlitMask  blitMask,
FrameBuffer &  other,
uint32_t  readAttachmentIndex = 0 
) const

Blit texture from this framebuffer to the specified framebuffer.

This does not follow OpenGL's API as closely, but is a cleaner interface

◆ blit() [2/2]

void rev::FrameBuffer::blit ( BlitMask  blitMask,
uint32_t  readColorAttachmentIndex,
const std::vector< uint32_t > &  drawAttachmentIndices 
) const
protected

blit with another framebuffer

This follows OpenGL's API closely, so the framebuffers bound to GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER and GL_WRITE_FRAMEBUFFER are used

Release all bound textures.

Initialize the FBO with the specified width and height

Uses RBO by default
